tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transparency_features (
    feature_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    feature_name STRING,
    feature_description TEXT,
    implementation_details JSON,
    user_feedback JSON
)

CREATE TABLE user_trust (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    trust_level VARCHAR(50),
    trust_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    is_trusted BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE TransparencyLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    action STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArProducts (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ArReviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    comment TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ArTransactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ar_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ar_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_transparency (
    transparency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    session_id INT NOT NULL,
    transparency_level INT NOT NULL,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ar_users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES ar_sessions(session_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    grant_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expire_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ar_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    details TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ar_users(user_id)
);
